column5: Explore the best of Tokyo in 5 days, from traditional temples to futuristic districts

column5: A perfect 3-day itinerary for first-time visitors to the City of Light
column9: [{"day": 1, "title": "Iconic Paris", "activities": [{"time": "09:00", "title": "Eiffel Tower", "location": "Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France", "description": "Start your day with stunning views from Paris's most iconic landmark"}, {"time": "12:30", "title": "Lunch at Café de Flore", "location": "172 Boulevard Saint-Germain", "description": "Enjoy a classic Parisian lunch at this historic café"}, {"time": "14:30", "title": "Louvre Museum", "location": "Rue de Rivoli", "description": "Explore one of the world's greatest art museums"}, {"time": "19:00", "title": "Seine River Cruise", "location": "Pont de l'Alma", "description": "See Paris illuminated from the water on an evening cruise"}]}, {"day": 2, "title": "Artistic Paris", "activities": [{"time": "10:00", "title": "Montmartre & Sacré-Cœur", "location": "35 Rue du Chevalier de la Barre", "description": "Explore the artistic neighborhood and visit the beautiful basilica"}, {"time": "13:00", "title": "Lunch at Le Consulat", "location": "18 Rue Norvins", "description": "Dine at this quintessential Montmartre restaurant"}, {"time": "15:00", "title": "Musée d'Orsay", "location": "1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur", "description": "Visit the impressive Impressionist collection in this former train station"}, {"time": "20:00", "title": "Dinner in Le Marais", "location": "Le Marais district", "description": "Enjoy dinner in one of Paris's trendiest neighborhoods"}]}, {"day": 3, "title": "Royal Paris", "activities": [{"time": "09:30", "title": "Palace of Versailles", "location": "Place d'Armes, Versailles", "description": "Take a day trip to the magnificent royal palace"}, {"time": "16:00", "title": "Champs-Élysées & Arc de Triomphe", "location": "Champs-Élysées", "description": "Stroll down Paris's most famous avenue"}, {"time": "19:30", "title": "Farewell dinner at Le Petit Prince", "location": "12 Rue de Lanneau", "description": "Enjoy your last evening with classic French cuisine"}]}]
